game.name: Dice Eater: A Supernatural Mystery Card Game
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: [Dice Eater]는 초능력을 사용해 상대의 속임수를 추리해내는, 초능력 추리 카드게임입니다.상대의 속임수를 역이용해, 게임에서 승리하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dice Eater is a mystery card game based around supernatural powers where players must use their power to uncover the other player's tricks. Use your opponent's tricks against them to turn the tables and win.

reviewHighlights.text: An extremely fun and unique game. Its about puzzle solving above all else, but presented in a way that you have to figure out what the puzzles are for...
Fun little game where the main gimmick is learning what supernatural powers your opponents are using to cheat at a dice game and turning those powers...
